law.catch_line: Processing of payments by servicer of high-cost home loan.

text.section: As used in this section, "servicer" means any person or entity who currently collects or processes payments on a high-cost home loan, as that term is defined in KRS 360.100, regardless of whether that person or entity is the owner, the holder, the assignee, the nominee for the loan, the beneficiary of a trust, or any person acting on behalf of such person.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 32, effective April 24, 2008.
